parameters.description: ID of the collection to update (Mandatory for updating)

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the collection (Mandatory for creation)

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Description of the collection (Optional)

parameters.name: private
parameters.description: Indicates if the collection if private (Optional, possibles values : '1' (for private) or '0' (for public, default value when creation))

parameters.name: items
parameters.description: List of shows/movies for the collection (Mandatory for creation, Optional for edition. Must be a JSON array with format : [{"type": "show", "id": 123, "note": "Note about series"}, {"type": "movie", "id": 456, "note": null}])

get.summary: Retrieve the list of episodes to watch.
get.description: Fetch the list of episodes to watch, with various filters and pagination options.

parameters.name: subtitles
parameters.description: Display episodes with specific subtitles available: all|vovf|vo|vf (Optional)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit to a number of episodes per series (Optional)

parameters.name: showsLimit
parameters.description: Limit to a number of series (Optional, default 50)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for series pagination (Optional, default 1)

parameters.name: showId
parameters.description: Series ID (Optional)

parameters.name: showTheTVDBId
parameters.description: Series ID on TheTVDB (Optional)

parameters.name: showIMDBId
parameters.description: Series ID on IMDB (Optional)

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: Member's ID (Optional, default identified member)

parameters.name: specials
parameters.description: Include special episodes in the return (Optional, default not returned)

parameters.name: released
parameters.description: If 1, displays only released episodes, 2 for upcoming, 0 for both (Optional, default 1)

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Order of episode appearance, "account" for account order, "smart" for current viewing order (Optional, default account)

parameters.name: since
parameters.description: Timestamp to mark episodes released after this date (Optional)

parameters.name: excludes
parameters.description: If specified, removes certain blocks from the return: characters (Optional)

parameters.name: platforms
parameters.description: List of platform IDs where the episodes must be available (Optional)

parameters.name: with_rewatch
parameters.description: Indicates if episodes to rewatch appear in the list for premium users (possible values : 0 or 1. Optional, default 0)

post.description: Indicate an episode has been downloaded.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Episode ID (Optional if thetvdb_id provided)

parameters.name: thetvdb_id
parameters.description: Episode ID on TheTVDB (Optional if id provided)

delete.summary: Remove the downloaded mark
delete.description: Unmark an episode as downloaded.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Episode ID (Optional if thetvdb_id provided)

parameters.name: thetvdb_id
parameters.description: Episode ID on TheTVDB (Optional if id provided)

post.description: Mark one or more episodes as watched, with options to specify multiple episodes, bulk marking, and deletion of future episode marks.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Episode ID (Optional if thetvdb_id provided)

parameters.name: thetvdb_id
parameters.description: Episode ID on TheTVDB (Optional if id provided)

parameters.name: youtube_id
parameters.description: Episode ID on YouTube (Optional if id provided)

parameters.name: bulk
parameters.description: If specified, all previous episodes will also be marked as watched (default true)

parameters.name: delete
parameters.description: If specified, all subsequent episodes will no longer be marked as watched

parameters.name: note
parameters.description: If a rating between 1 and 5 is specified, rate the episode

delete.summary: Unmark an episode as watched
delete.description: Remove the watched mark from one or more episodes, allowing for multiple episodes to be specified.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Episode ID (Optional if thetvdb_id provided)

parameters.name: thetvdb_id
parameters.description: Episode ID on TheTVDB (Optional if id provided)

parameters.name: youtube_id
parameters.description: Episode ID on YouTube. Multiple IDs can be specified separated by a comma (Optional if id provided)

parameters.name: subtitles
parameters.description: Display subtitles if specified (Optional)

parameters.description: Number of results per page, default 20

parameters.name: all

parameters.description: Precisely removes the rewatch for the given episode (format Y-m-d H:i:s)

parameters.description: Time limit, month for series ended in the last 30 days, all for all finished series (Optional, default month)

post.description: Bulk watch an entire show.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Series ID.

parameters.name: note
parameters.description: Rating assigned from 1 to 5 (optional)

delete.summary: Remove watch for an entire show
delete.description: Remove all episodes watched and rewatched for an entire show.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Series ID.

post.description: Mark all episodes of a show already seen by user has rewatched.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Series ID.

delete.summary: Delete each rewatch an entire show
delete.description: Delete all episodes already rewatched for a show.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Series ID.

parameters.name: all
parameters.description: Remove all rewatch for the given show (int 0|1)

get.summary: Get shows ranking based on BigQuery aggregated data.
get.description: Get ranking of shows for a specific day with various filters. This data comes from BigQuery aggregated statistics exported daily.

parameters.name: day
parameters.description: Date for ranking (format Y-m-d), default is yesterday

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Country code for ranking (fr, de, es, all), default is fr

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of ranking: recent (shows with ≤3 seasons) or all, default is recent

parameters.name: period
parameters.description: Period in days (7 or 30), default is 7

parameters.name: svod
parameters.description: Filter by SVOD availability: only (SVOD only) or all, default is only

parameters.name: genre
parameters.description: Genre filter: all, animation, no_animation, default is no_animation

parameters.name: platform_id
parameters.description: Filter by specific platform ID (optional)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit the number of shows to return (max 100), default is 100

get.summary: Display the latest subtitles retrieved by BetaSeries
get.description: Displays the latest subtitles retrieved by BetaSeries.

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: Number of subtitles, maximum 100

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Display only certain languages: all|vovf|vo|vf (Optional)

get.summary: Display subtitles for a given show
get.description: Displays subtitles for a given show.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the show

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Display only certain languages: all|vovf|vo|vf (Optional)

get.summary: Display subtitles for a given episode
get.description: Displays subtitles for a given episode.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the episode

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Display only certain languages: all|vovf|vo|vf (Optional)

get.summary: Display subtitles for a season or all seasons
get.description: Displays subtitles for a specific season or all seasons.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the series

parameters.name: season
parameters.description: Season number or 'all' to retrieve packages for all seasons (Optional, default is all)

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Display only certain languages: all|vovf|vo|vf (Optional)

post.summary: Reports subtitles as incorrect to be removed from the list.
post.description: Reports subtitles as incorrect to be removed from the list.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the subtitle

parameters.name: reason
parameters.description: Reason why the subtitle is incorrect

get.summary: Display all tags created by the connected member
get.description: Displays all the tags created by the connected member.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of media for the tags to display (show or movie, default is show)

post.summary: Add a tag (or several) for the show (or movie) for the connected member
post.description: Adds a tag (or several) for the show (or the movie) for the connected member.

parameters.name: show_id
parameters.description: ID of the show

parameters.name: movie_id
parameters.description: ID of the movie

parameters.name: tag
parameters.description: Label of the tag to create. You can add several by separating them with a comma

delete.summary: Remove a tag for the show (or movie) for the connected member
delete.description: Removes a tag for the show (or the movie) for the connected member.

parameters.name: show_id
parameters.description: ID of the show

parameters.name: movie_id
parameters.description: ID of the movie

parameters.name: tag
parameters.description: Label of the tag to remove. You can specify several by separating them with a comma

get.description: Displays the latest events on the site.

parameters.name: last_id
parameters.description: ID of the last event received to get subsequent ones (Optional)
